Flimbo
Friday, August 18th, 2017, 1:12:38 PM

Idea 1: Sack of Cats. Auction Item.

8x, ball and chain base. Starts with somewhat damage weighting, somewhat crit weighting.

Adds 1 level of weighting for every dhu kitten you put inside the sack.

Ambient scripts, which change/evolve based on number of cats in the bag.

Idea 2: Simpler. Everyday item. I want a pipe that I can blow bubbles with. Blow bubbles and then say things like "indubably". Nobody smokes anymore. Convert all pipes to blow bubbles!

Sabotage
Wednesday, August 23rd, 2017, 2:39:10 AM

Wind Walker sword (must be an edged weapon)

  • can WAVE (using hurl skill for AS) a blade of wind from itself, unlimited, while the weapon never leaves your hand.
  • 3x per day MSTRIKEish version (player friendly)
  • double air strikes possible when swung

Wind Walker cloak

  • adds 10% dodge (flat rate), no training required
  • make you lighter on your feet, reducing encumbrance by 1 tier

Berserker's armor

  • Full plate only
  • works kind of like WoundedWear except it will heal down any T2-3 wounds to T1 for 3s RT and 5 health
  • T3 wounds would take 2 rounds to get to T1 ( so 6s RT and 10 health)
  • Crit kills still kill you
  • auto heal ability can be toggled

Crossbow repeating armband

  • similar to the trap shooting armbands but can be loaded with up to 3 arrows
  • Shoots all ammo loaded at once
  • uses the SMR to decide outcome of shot
Sabotage
Wednesday, August 23rd, 2017, 3:12:26 AM

sword of Imaera (the flower sword)

  • made of wood
  • must be converted to Imaera for any flares to work
  • can be turned to access different flares
  • all forms have regular flare rates
  • Form of the Cherry Blossom - When it flares it will always strike the area hit, places a seedling into the wound which rapidly grows out and does damage as it does.
  • Form of the Rose - Flares by shooting out multiple thorns which impact multiple locations on the target.
  • Form of the Morning Glory - Flare are vines that wrap around the target, binding them.
  • Form of the Bamboo - Flare shoots seeds of bamboo onto the ground which rapidly grow (basically a spikethorn). This would use your character's level as the ranger spell base.
Sabotage
Wednesday, August 23rd, 2017, 3:33:12 AM

blade of Onar

  • Must become attuned to the blade, but only someone converted to Onar can make use of anything besides the flare
  • Any damage done to the target places a stacking poison equal to damage you hit them for. 40 damage would put a 40 round poison which keeps stacking with each hit. (I know this weapon already exists)
  • LICK - fully attuned or you die - you ingest the poison into yourself but it decreases all attacking RT to its base amount (disregard encumbrance), double swing flares on every swing, and you still get its normal flares. This last for 1 minute after which you lose 6 spirit. This ability can be used 1-3x per day.

mark
Friday, August 25th, 2017, 1:05:03 PM

Large shield. 1x/day or whatever, RAISE it to activate. For the next 30 minutes, if you die, you will be resurrected and fully healed 5 seconds later (Standing, with no RT, in the same room that you died, with the beneficial spells you died with reapplied). This can only occur once per activation. Call it, I dunno, the 'Aegis of the Immortal'

A stylus to choose which spell on a scroll will be unlocked with the next unlocking wave

Sabotage
Tuesday, December 19th, 2017, 8:24:52 PM

An item that tracks your enhansive's charges. You have to get the enhansive sung to and within a certain time frame (think how players shops work) you use an activator on the item and it will keep track of that enhansive as long as it stays somewhere on your person (container included, but not a locker). You can use another activator to get a read out of all your currently tracked enhansives.

Revial
Tuesday, December 19th, 2017, 8:53:36 PM

Items that 'unlock' combat maneuvers of a certain rank. If they don't exist already.

Example - A shield that gives you a certain rank in shield bashing. A pair of boots that give you combat mobility. A pair of gloves that grants hammerfist.

Things of that nature.
